channel.title: 8TeVDocAnalyses on ATLAS Open Data
channel.description: Recent content in 8TeVDocAnalyses on ATLAS Open Data

item.title: 8TeVAnalyses
item.description: Analyses We have prepared seven analyses for you. Ranging from measuring Standard Model particles including a Higgs analysis and a search for a Beyond the Standard Model particle. Let’s take a look at these processes. (W) Boson Analysis The (W) and (Z) bosons are together known as the weak or the intermediate vector bosons. These Standard Model elementary particles mediate the weak interaction. The (W) boson analysis is intended to provide an example for a high statistics analysis using the ATLAS open data dataset.
